# Nadine's story {#nadine}

Meet Nadine Abdelhalim, see figure \@ref(fig:ivo-fig) she graduated with a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science in 2023 when this episode was first recorded. During her degree, Nadine worked at [imago.cs.manchester.ac.uk](https://imago.cs.manchester.ac.uk/) and [arm.com](https://www.arm.com/).
